page.title: 13ESSO
page.content: Fawley refinery is the biggest refinery in the UK, the biggest in Europe and the 10th biggest in the world. It covers more than 4450 acres of land. 1250 goes to development and the remaining 3200 is the actual refinery; some of the land is used by ESSO chemicals. The refinery is always open it never closes down its open 24hours aday 365 days a year.The catilytic cracking plant was recently shut down for its 4 year overhaul.Most of the people working on it are contractors.There are over 2500 contractors working in the plant.There are over 1400 people working for ESSO PETROLEUM and over 700 people working at ESSO CHEMICALS. All these people are used just to keep the refinery going. Fawley produces four different products (1)petrol (2)diesel (3)
